fields.name: quartech_areyouapplyingforatraceabilityknowledget
fields.label: Are you applying for a Traceability Knowledge Transfer Activity? (please note, seafood organizations are eligible for this type of activity)
fields.tooltipText: Some examples of Traceability Knowledge Transfer events include: Importance of traceability in sustainable business strategies and how it can improve food safety, risk management and scalability of business; Current and emerging technologies and resources in addressing food fraud; Traceability and best management practices for small farms; Hands-on demonstration and training session with vendor(s) on the use of dedicated traceability software and equipment. For more information about the Traceability Knowledge Transfer program, please visit: https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/industry/agriculture-seafood/programs/bc-traceability-funding-programs
